forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk blankets Downtown San Francisco, the gentle embrace of partly cloudy skies offers a tranquil respite from the bustling day. The low hangs around a crisp 48 degrees, giving way to a slow, serene rise to about 50 overnight. A soft wind whispers at 7 mph from the west-northwest, adding a touch of coolness that invites one to cozy up in a light jacket, perhaps paired with a warm scarf to fend off the evening chill.

As the sun rises tomorrow, it is anticipated to paint the city in vibrant hues beneath a clear, sunlit sky, with temperatures reaching a peak near 62 degrees before gracefully tapering down to 60 by the afternoon. The wind will swirl gently, stirring a sense of movement and life that feels invigorating. While the day’s forecast promises clarity, the coastal fog that often drapes itself lazily over the Golden Gate may yet linger at the edges, enhancing the city’s storied mystique. A perfect day to stroll through the local parks, enjoy a leisurely café visit, or perhaps delight in some quiet reading by a window with a view of the heart of the city unfolding outside.
